card.name: Loan
card.text: Worth 1 Coin. When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.

card.name: Trade Route
card.text: +1 Buy +$1 per token on the Trade Route mat. Trash a card from your hand. ---------- Setup: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.

card.name: Watchtower
card.text: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand. ---------- When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.

card.name: Bishop
card.text: +$1 +1 <VP> Trash a card from your hand. +<VP> equal to half its cost in coins, rounded down. Each other player may trash a card from his hand.

card.name: Quarry
card.text: Worth 1 Coin. ---------- While this is in play, Action cards cost $2 less, but not less than $0.

card.name: Talisman
card.text: Worth 1 Coin. ---------- While this is in play, when you buy a card costing $4 or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.

card.name: Worker's Village
card.text: +1 Card +2 Actions +1 Buy

card.name: City
card.text: +1 Card +2 Actions If there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +$1 and +1 Buy.

card.name: Contraband
card.text: Worth 3 Coins. +1 Buy When you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can't buy that card this turn.

card.name: Counting House
card.text: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.

card.name: Mint
card.text: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it. ---------- When you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.

card.name: Mountebank
card.text: +2 Coins Each other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse and a Copper.

card.name: Rabble
card.text: +3 Cards Each other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.

card.name: Royal Seal
card.text: Worth 2 Coins. ---------- While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.

card.name: Vault
card.text: +2 Cards Discard any number of cards. +$1 per card discarded. Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.

card.name: Venture
card.text: Worth 1 Coin. When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.

card.name: Goons
card.text: +1 Buy +$2 Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. ---------- While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1 <VP>.

card.name: Grand Market
card.text: +1 Card +1 Action +1 Buy +$2 ---------- You can't buy this if you have any Copper in play.

card.name: Hoard
card.text: Worth 2 Coins. ---------- While this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.

card.name: Bank
card.text: Worth ? Coins. When you play this, it`s worth $1 per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).

card.name: Expand
card.text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $3 more than the trashed card.

card.name: Forge
card.text: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in coins of the trashed cards.

card.name: King's Court
card.text: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.

card.name: Peddler
card.text: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Coin ---------- During your Buy phase, this costs $2 less per Action card you have in play, but not less than $0.

card.name: Platinum
card.text: 5 Coins.
